549f9f82-b1dc-46e4-abf9-6ae0bfa5eab3.description: Learners who achieve this badge understand that value streams are complex work systems that provide value to customers. They’ve learned how to define value streams, and plan and prepare for measurable value stream transformation by developing and socializing a comprehensive charter.
549f9f82-b1dc-46e4-abf9-6ae0bfa5eab3.name: Value Stream Transformation Part 1 of 2 - Preparation

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Value Stream Transformation course
Pass an examination with a score of at least 70%

8ed83946-4ea8-44d9-bee3-77b0fb08502f.description: Learners who achieve this badge understand how to solve problems in a methodical way that address the root cause of the problem provides efficiency, effectiveness and more importantly resolutions. They’ve learned how to define and quantify problem without assumptions and biases. They've also learned how to engage individuals and leaders in problem solving.
8ed83946-4ea8-44d9-bee3-77b0fb08502f.name: Scientific Problem Solving

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Scientific Problem Solving course.
Pass an examination with a score of at least 70%

6f46a308-477c-4cee-aee2-8d51062fdabb.description: Learners who achieve this badge understand what Leader Standard Work is and how it benefits organizations. They’ve learned the guidelines for how much of a leader’s time is governed by LSW and some of the common perceived barriers around LSW and why they aren’t true. They've also learned how to identify activities, create, and document LSW at all levels of the organization.
6f46a308-477c-4cee-aee2-8d51062fdabb.name: Leader Standard Work

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Leader Standard Work course
Pass an examination with a score of at least 70%

57466904-3036-4168-8939-9a59836c75e9.description: Learners who achieve this badge understand what Standard Work is and how it provides stability and predictability to processes in all industries. They've also learned the critical elements of well-designed and well-documented standard work, the various formats for documenting standard work, and how to manage and improve standard work.
57466904-3036-4168-8939-9a59836c75e9.name: Standard Work

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Standard Work course
Pass an examination with a score of at least 70%

8637b4f8-b237-4a83-b121-1781077e6a90.description: Learners who achieve this badge understand that one of the most fundamental ways organizations can improve performance is to adopt a relentless focus on the elimination of waste. They’ve learned what waste looks like in organizations and how to identify and eliminate waste and waste-generating conditions. They've also learned how to identify the three conditions to be avoided to improve performance, create a better workplace for employees and increasing value for the customers.
8637b4f8-b237-4a83-b121-1781077e6a90.name: Create Value & Eliminate Waste

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Create Value and Eliminate Waste course
Pass an examination with a score of at least 70%

e73c63aa-7d8b-4271-a5c1-8e5fd5265d8a.description: Learners who achieve this badge understand how to build value stream maps to understand the current state and design a greatly improved future state. They’ve also learned how to develop and manage a transformation action plan to realize the future state design.
e73c63aa-7d8b-4271-a5c1-8e5fd5265d8a.name: Value Stream Transformation Part 2 of 2 - Discovery & Design

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Value Stream Transformation course
Pass an examination with a score of at least 70%

ac8e0544-19c4-4949-ae9c-e0ac0b2b5bcf.description: Learners who achieve this badge understand how to provide clarity on what happens on a daily basis, supporting frontline teams and providing an effective way for them to achieve their goals. They’ve learned what managing work actually means and how to build and roll out an effective Daily Management System (DMS). They've also learned the role DMS plays in business performance improvement.
ac8e0544-19c4-4949-ae9c-e0ac0b2b5bcf.name: Daily Management Systems

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Daily Management Systems course
Pass an examination with a score of at least 70%

a4fd5f67-c274-405c-bf2e-a96d9da82ef1.description: Learners who achieve this badge understand how to improve safety and performance by adopting 5S practices. They've learned what 5S is and how it benefits customers, team members, and the organization. They've also learned how to develop strong 5S practices within an organization.
a4fd5f67-c274-405c-bf2e-a96d9da82ef1.name: 5S: Sort, Set in order, Shine, Standardize, Sustain

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 5S course
Pass an examination with a score of at least 70%

f9866b27-f35c-4f89-a274-6a9100663cfa.description: Learners who achieve this badge understand common obstacles to effective problem solving and why specialized coaches are needed to build organizational capabilities. They’ve learned the skills and traits problem-solving coaches should possess, the varied roles coaches play, and specific coaching techniques, including use of the problem-solving A3 report.
f9866b27-f35c-4f89-a274-6a9100663cfa.name: Problem-Solving Coaching

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Problem-Solving Coaching course
Pass an examination with a score of at least 70%

3e25b50d-2cbe-41c6-bee4-13a2a9ee0a08.description: Learners who achieve this badge understand how and when to use a systematic method to identify the true cause(s) of a problem. They've learned several methods for breaking down a problem and determine what is truly causing it. They've also learned techniques for brainstorming, prioritizing, and validating possible causes—and how to build and sustain a root cause analysis mindset.
3e25b50d-2cbe-41c6-bee4-13a2a9ee0a08.name: Root Cause Analysis

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Root Cause Analysis course
Pass an examination with a score of at least 70%

8e8f8fdd-1a76-4227-b4de-7f4fbab02e88.description: Learners who achieve this badge understand the difference between value streams and processes, how to create metrics-based process maps, and how to use key metrics to drive and measure improvement—and monitor processes on an ongoing basis. They've also learned how to plan for and kick off these powerful mapping activities.
8e8f8fdd-1a76-4227-b4de-7f4fbab02e88.name: Metrics-Based Process Mapping

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Metrics-Based Process Mapping course
Pass an examination with a score of at least 70%

6474f0ef-c3f2-4791-ae33-7d27abcae5c4.description: Learners who achieve this badge understand what strategy deployment is, what’s required to develop an impactful strategy deployment plan, and how to manage the plan to produce the results it promises to achieve. They also understand how to conduct an “extra effort inventory,” which services as an input when developing the plan.
6474f0ef-c3f2-4791-ae33-7d27abcae5c4.name: Strategy Deployment

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Strategy Deployment course
Pass an examination with a score of at least 70%

308829c6-7b47-43b9-9753-e083cf096f5d.description: Learners who achieve this badge understand why building data literacy is critical for all organizations. They’ve learned the importance of gaining upfront clarity about the goals of an analysis, and how to ask for and receive better datasets that more accurately reflect the reality they need to understand.
308829c6-7b47-43b9-9753-e083cf096f5d.name: Analyzing Data: Clarity First

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Analyzing Data: Clarity First course
Pass an examination with a score of at least 70%

4b2f5a54-ae35-4e6f-ba53-f724bbb5e50f.description: Learners who achieve this badge understand what continuous improvement is—and how culture is the glue that enables continuous improvement to flourish in all areas of an organization. They also understand the required cultural characteristics and management practices that enable improvement, which leads to top performance on all fronts.
4b2f5a54-ae35-4e6f-ba53-f724bbb5e50f.name: Building a Continuous Improvement Culture

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Building a Continuous Improvement Culture course.
Pass an examination with a score of at least 70%

569a4c34-e13c-4cdc-b44f-b9f6d428e894.description: Learners who achieve this badge understand what problem-solving A3 Reports are, the significant individual and organizational benefits they carry, and the step-by-step process for creating them. They also understand how to avoid the common mistakes people make when creating these high-value communication tools.
569a4c34-e13c-4cdc-b44f-b9f6d428e894.name: Creating A3 Reports

badge_template_activities.title: Completing the Creating A3 Reports course.
Pass an examination with a score of at least 70%.

cd06aee5-9194-48e9-9f08-c92ad9ba155b.description: Learners who achieve this badge understand how KPIs differ from other types of measurement, how to use KPIs to drive improvement, how to select KPIs, and when to use tiered KPIs to achieve organization-wide strategic goals.
cd06aee5-9194-48e9-9f08-c92ad9ba155b.name: Key Performance Indicators

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Key Performance Indicators course
Pass an examination with a score of at least 70%

6b7d4c88-567a-44e6-b0bb-a6d4efd2cf7b.description: Learners who achieve this badge understand how Rapid Improvement Events (RIEs—also known as Kaizen Events) generate rapid results—and also build organizational capabilities, such as agility, problem-solving, cross-functional collaboration, and using laser focus to accomplish more in less time. They also know the step-by-step process for planning and holding successful RIEs.
6b7d4c88-567a-44e6-b0bb-a6d4efd2cf7b.name: Rapid Improvement Events

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Rapid Improvement Events course
Pass an examination with a score of at least 70%

60f6c363-7bd5-4d39-b803-ae4041232944.description: Learners who achieve this badge understand the benefits of Process Walks, the step-by-step method for planning and conducting Process Walks, and how to avoid the common mistakes improvement teams make.
60f6c363-7bd5-4d39-b803-ae4041232944.name: Process Walks

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Process Walks course.
Pass an examination with a score of at least 70%.

e76c61cd-6357-4fb9-b4c4-8fda707e7e17.description: Learners who achieve this badge understand the Training Within Industry Job Instruction method, its benefits, and the step-by-step approach to effective training for skill development. They have also seen a real-world demonstration of the method to deepen their understanding.
e76c61cd-6357-4fb9-b4c4-8fda707e7e17.name: Training Within Industry: Job Instruction

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Training Within Industry: Job Instruction course.
Pass an examination with a score of at least 70%

1f27f35f-1c13-4813-891f-448ffc7f4094.description: One of the most fundamental ways to create a high-performing workplace—and lock in the success of continuous improvement efforts—is to create a Visual Workplace. A visual workplace guides employees to do the RIGHT thing at the RIGHT time. It reinforces best practices and promotes adherence to process standards, which leads to fewer errors, reduced risk of injury, and more consistent output quality. Visuals make work easier to learn and perform, less costly, and more joyful to accomplish.
1f27f35f-1c13-4813-891f-448ffc7f4094.name: Creating a Visual Workplace

badge_template_activities.title: Learners must pass an examination with a score of at least 70%.
